item.description:
This event is sponsored by Mary of Midnight Rodeo , I am posting for purposes of getting people that are in my Monday night line dancing class who are activley into  line dance, get " motivated to join", this will be excellant way to improve your line dance skills and join me on the dance floor at MRB offered every Saturday night lesson at 7:30 Band starts to play at 9pm with a DJ in between sets. This year 10/27 will also have huge Halloween party!! will keep you all posted. So come out n have some boot scootin fun times!! Nothing beats insrtuctional dance!!

You can also join Midnight Rodeo Meet Up for weekly updates.

 

Howdy... I attached the registration form for the All Day Fall Workshop with Michelle Jackson and Kathy Slowey on October 20th. Get your registrations in by Oct.13th. Mail them or register at MRB on any Saturday night.
If you have any questions feel free to get in touch dance@midnightrodeobar.com Workshop registration October 20th.pdf Download · Upload Revision

SATURDAY, OCTOBER 20th

Midnight Rodeo Bar

1211 S. Mammoth Rd

Manchester, NH 03108

10:00am - 12:30pm

Beginner Line Dance lessons

Or

12:30pm - 1:30pm

Couples Dance Lessons

4:00pm–9:00pm

Dinner at the Yard

(choose from a special dinner menu)

Items subject to change

7:00pm - 12:30am

At The Midnight Rodeo Bar

Bobby Carlson and the Stones

River Band

Register on, or by mail by October 13th

Add $10.00 after Oct. 13th. Please do not mail

after October 15th

& Evening Dance
